resources.string:
⚡ Easily create new notes by entering text in the designated input field.
⚡ Get rid of unnecessary entries with a left or right swipe on the note item.
⚡ Edit notes with a simple tap. Open the editing mode to make changes.
⚡ Mark notes as completed with a long press on the item.
ExpressNotes - the note-taking app is for creating notes, providing convenient management of your records
